subject: Pro x pedal first time install / stuck in upgrade mode
description_text:
Hi, 

I have just received my pro x pedals but they are stuck in upgrade mode. 

I believe I need the simsonnflasher.exe file which has not downloaded in the simsonn manager install and can’t be found online. 

Can you send me the files to set up my pedals please? 

Kind regards 
Max 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi max west,  Please release the upgrade button on the control box and reconnect the USB; the device will then enter working mode.
